name: Phantasia
storyline:
You take the role of Caerula, a seemingly young man that lost his memories 2 years ago and has been living in the Inn of Baldric Village for a month now. 
Caerula is trying to remember himself while exploring this new world around him while seeing himself in the crossfire of politics, ideologies and wars of the different residents of the Phantasia World!
summary: Free-to-play open-world RPG! Phantasia is inspired by the oldschool JRPGs with modern mechanics! Defeat incredible monsters, mine, craft and make potions while changing the course of history with the actions you take!
